title: Introducing Curio: A Lotus-Miner Replacement for Filecoin Storage Providers
excerpt: Meet Curio! It's never been easier for a data center to be a Filecoin Storage Provider (SP) than with Curio, which takes care of the responsibilities of reliable SP storage proving & sealing with minimal operations time.

image.alt: Introducing Curio: A Lotus-Miner Replacement for Filecoin Storage Providers

author: Andy Jackson
